review: Love love love the fire stick
author: Rick Serra

review: Easy to install and use. Would recommend!
author: S Lewis

review: Yes, it did. I love it. It is very simple to set up and easy to use.Thanks,Thuc
author: Thuc X. Nguyen "thucxnguyen"

review: It is great for watching stuff on Amazon. It is very hard to stream Slingo or even MLB.TV on. It is always buffering when you are running those apps.
author: Ty W

review: It's a little too sluggish to get anything more than 3 stars, but if you can deal with the slow performance you really do get a lot of bang-for-your-buck
author: S. Galea

review: Very VERY good, I bought it on black Friday for 25$ andit is the best 25$ I have ever spent, I have very slow internet and this load videos in 1080p just fine with my internet no problem, no buffering, nothing.I jus have one complaint, when I switch the fire tv between tvs it tends to show up a blue screen when I put on something to watch, how do I fix that?
author: scott

review: Most apps don't work for Comcast customers. But it's a great product for a spare bedroom or a tv that doesn't get used much.
author: Sean Valentine "Don't panic"
